newsitem.title: USA: Cousins Properties files shelf registration.
newsitem.headline: Cousins Properties files shelf registration.

text.p: Cousins Properties Inc said Monday it had filed a shelf registration statement for the offering from time to time of up to $200 million of common stock, warrants to purchase common stock, and debt securities.
The company said it would determine the terms of each offering at the time of sale.
It said it planned to use the money generated from the sales for "general corporate purposes," including the acquisition and development of properties and the repayment of debt.
Cousins Properties Inc is an equity real estate investment trust.
